error_list.error_des: It seems that preposition use may be incorrect here.
The punctuation in ,, is incorrect. Consider changing the punctuation.
It appears that you are missing a comma after the introductory phrase Similarly. Consider adding a comma.
It seems that guardian may not agree in number with other words in this phrase.
The modal verb ought seems to be missing its required partner to. Consider adding the word to.
The noun phrase point seems to be missing a determiner before it. Consider adding an article.
